author: noble
msg: SOLR-7073: rename the .jar files to .jar.bin so that the build scripts don't fail

author: markt
msg: Avoid a BufferOverflowException when an AJP response body chunk larger than the socket write buffer is being written. This typically requires a larger than default AJP packetSize.

msg: Avoid a BufferOverflowException when an AJP response body chunk larger than the socket write buffer is being written. This typically requires a larger than default AJP packetSize.

author: markt
msg: It passes but this is to catch regressions and for consistency with earlier branches.

author: elecharny
msg: o Added a dedicated logger for the transaction : TXN_LOG
o Removed the lock from the AbstractTransactionManager
o Added a map to keep a track of the number of times a page is written
o Fixes in the way we handle transactions in the RM
